label: Ensure Diagnostic logs for 'ContainerRegistryRepositoryEvents' and 'ContainerRegistryLoginEvents' are enabled and are forwarded to Splunk
description: The event log contains information about the api objects which include pods, services, replicationcontrollers, and other This logs when forwarded to Splunk provide necessary information to create notable alerts for any rule created to allow connection from internet.
link: link to terrform line/comment where requirement is implemented
